projectDescription: An interactive web application that lets users have AI-powered conversations with legendary Indian historical personalities. Users can chat with figures like Mahatma Gandhi, Shivaji Maharaj, APJ Abdul Kalam, and more, with each personality responding authentically based on their character, values, and speaking style.

features.name: Landing Page
features.description: Hero section with project introduction and call-to-action buttons

features.name: Authentication
features.description: Sign up and sign in functionality with email/password using Supabase Auth

features.name: Personality Browser (Chatboard)
features.description: Browse and search through 10+ Indian historical personalities with their bios and values

features.name: Chat Interface
features.description: Real-time chat with AI-powered historical personalities using Gemini API

features.name: Conversation History
features.description: View and manage past conversations with different personalities

features.name: Personality Seeding
features.description: Admin interface to populate database with historical personalities

personalities: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj (1630-1680) - Courage and Strategy
Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam (1931-2015) - Innovation and Youth Empowerment
Rani Lakshmibai (1828-1858) - Bravery and Women's Strength
Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose (1897-1945) - Total Freedom

tables: personalities - Historical figures with bios and speaking styles
conversations - Chat sessions between users and personalities
messages - Individual chat messages with role (user/assistant)
